oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Regnum Persicum Imperium Turcicum in Asia Russorum Provinciae ad Mare Caspium: aliaequae regiones finitimae, item Ponti Euxini, Maris Caspii, ac Sinus Persici novissimae ac fidelissimae delineationes

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Covers the Middle East, Southern Caucasus, Central Asia and portions of Egypt, the Arabian Peninsula and Southeastern Europe.
